title: Love Island's Kendall Rae Knight flashes her toned abs in a tiny white crop top in Manchester
text:
She's just gone public with her new beau, professional footballer Andrew Hughes.

And Kendall Rae Knight was glowing with happiness as she enjoyed a night out in Manchester on Saturday.

The 27-year-old reality star stunned as she confidently flashed her toned abs while posing for the pictures ahead of a night at Rosso Restaurant.

Stunning: Kendall Rae Knight, 27, flashed her toned abs and a smile as she enjoyed a night out at Rosso Restaurant in Manchester on Saturday

Kendall opted for a neutral ensemble and donned a pair of statement printed beige trousers to make her outfit standout.

The beauty emphasised her assets in a tiny white top which had a built in bra and completed her look with white high heels.

She wore her long brown locks down and straight for the night in Manchester and kept her makeup simple, adding a nude lipstick and slight smokey eye.

Date night: Kendall was joined by Preston footballer boyfriend Andrew Hughes on Saturday

All smiles: The Love Island star looked stunning in a pair of statement trousers and white heels

On Thursday Kendall went public with her new boyfriend after finally finding the man of her dreams – in Preston.

The brunette failed to find love during a short stay in the Love Island villa last year, where she embarked on a doomed romance with fitness fanatic Adam Collard.

But more than a year after leaving the show Kendall has been wooed by professional footballer Andrew, a defender with Championship club Preston North End.

Couple: Andrew and Kendall held hands as they left Rosso Restaurant in Manchester

Taking to Instagram, the TV personality shared her first snap with the Welsh sportsman, 27.

She also revealed they had been dating for some time before finally going public.

Captioning the shot, she wrote: 'He got me. We’ve had the longest run at keeping us private but here I am ruining it!

'Thanks for making me the happiest I’ve ever felt and also irritating me for what feels like forever.. don’t worry I plan on being just as annoying for the foreseeable future.'

Stylish pair: The Love Island star, left, and footballer, right, both looked fashionable with Andrew opting for an all black attire with a checked jumper over his shoulders

Friends: The couple were joined on the night out by some pals who they greeted in the street

Toned: Kendall showed off her toned figure in a tiny crop top and fitted trousers on Saturday

Kendall made her reality show debut on the 2018 series of Love Island, but became the first housemate dumped from the island following her romance with Collard.

During the Love Island Christmas reunion, the former shoe shop worker shared a kiss with fellow contestant Eyal Booker, but the romance soon fizzled out.

Her new relationship comes following social media backlash for having a nose job after she revealed she struggled to breathe ahead of the procedure.

Fashionable: Kendall tucked her patterned trousers into her the ankle straps of her heels
description: Kendall Rae Knight, 27, was glowing with happiness as she enjoyed a night out in Manchester on Saturday. The reality TV star opted for statement trousers and a white top for the evening.
